HASTE.NAME: Haste
HASTE.DESC: On round start, consume all Haste to increase the Speed of {owner}'s actions by {stacks}.

STAGGERED.NAME: Staggered
STAGGERED.DESC:
Cannot take actions. All incoming damage is doubled.
This effect wears off at the start of round {round}.

VULNERABLE.NAME: Vulnerable
VULNERABLE.DESC: Incoming damage is increased by 50% until the end of this round.
